title: anaathuDanu gaanu
sahitya:
anAthuDanu gAnu; rAma nE!   
(anAthuDanu)

anupallavi

anAthuDavu nIvani niga majnyula sanAtanula mATa vinnAnu;
nE   
(anAthuDanu)

caraNam

nirAdaravu jUci, yI kali narAdhamulanEru
purANapuruSa! purAripunuta! nAgarATshayana!
tyAgarAjanuta!   
(anAthuDanu)
